item.title: Trump Tamps Down on Epstein Infighting Between the FBI and DOJ
item.description: The president is in this mess because he has turned his Justice Department into a component of his political operation.

item.title: Five Samurai: Managing Japan’s Baby Bust
item.description: The week of July 7, 2025: Adapting to a falling population, tariffs, fiscal policy, Mamdani’s grocery stores, and much more.

item.title: Exclusive: Thune Reflects on Reconciliation, Previews What’s Next for Senate GOP Agenda
item.description: ‘Nothing is easy around here, and that one was particularly challenging, but it was a good outcome,’ said Thune of the mega-bill.

item.title: The U.S. Navy’s Cultural Crisis
item.description: Unless a bold shift is made, America risks losing its standing in the Pacific and beyond.

item.title: Gen Z at the Nunnery?
item.description: Young people seem to know where the answers are.
